articles.title: US to boost troop numbers in Europe amid Russian threat - ABC News
articles.description: Joe Biden says the United States will increase troop numbers in Europe to 100,000 and will send two additional squadrons of F-35 fighter jets to the United Kingdom.
articles.content:
President Joe Biden says the US will significantly expand its military presence in Europe, as part of reshaped plans for the continent's security.
